nodes.text: Yub Nub was an orange-colored, fruity alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The cocktail was named after the Ewokese word for "freedom," and it included seeds from imported Endorian fruit. Suitable for human consumption, the drink was served in a traditional cup of Endor's native Ewok species that depicted their participation in the Battle of Endor, and the accompanying drink coaster had an illustration of one of the furry beings. In his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, author and explorer Eloc Throno wrote that Yub Nub was his favorite cocktail at Oga's Cantina and that it reminded him of his travels on the Ewok homeworld.

Yub Nub is an alcoholic beverage that was first revealed through a promotional post on StarWars.com on February 27, 2019, and it is available for purchase by guests in the Oga's Cantina bar at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, a themed land that opened at Disneyland Park on May 31 of the same year. The menu's description reads, "Malibu Pineapple Rum, Sailor Jerry Spiced Rum, Citrus Juices, and Passion Fruit served in a souvenir Endor mug."
